title: Soup with flavour
description:

-Stock cube

title: Steak and potatoes
description:
Ingredients:
-Steak
-Butter
-Potatoes
BBQ sauce

Cook steak in butter on medium-high heat until reaching desired colour. Boil potatoes until soft inside, testing periodically with a fork. Serve while warm.
